name: core-routing
description: Framework agnostic interface for client sided routing using HTML5 history api.

scripts.bundle:prod: npx parcel build src/router.ts --global Router --target browser -o ./dist/router.prod.js
scripts.bundle:dev: npx parcel build src/router.ts --global Router --target browser --no-minify -o ./dist/router.dev.js
scripts.bundle: npm run bundle:dev && npm run bundle:prod
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run bundle:prod && npm run test
